11  KSGeoSurface::KSGeoSurface() :
12  fParent( NULL ),
13  fContents()

17  KSComponent(),
18  fParent( NULL ),

30  void KSGeoSurface::On() const
31  {
32  geomsg_debug( "on geo surface <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom )
33  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
34  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
35  {
36  (*tCommandIt)->Activate();
37  }
38  return;
39  }
40  void KSGeoSurface::Off() const
41  {
42  geomsg_debug( "off geo surface <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom )
43  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
44  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
45  {
46  (*tCommandIt)->Deactivate();
47  }
48  return;
49  }
50 
51  KThreeVector KSGeoSurface::Point( const KThreeVector& aPoint ) const
52  {
53  double tDistance;
54  KThreeVector tPoint;
55  vector< KGSurface* >::const_iterator tSurface;
56 
57  double tNearestDistance = std::numeric_limits< double >::max();
58  KThreeVector tNearestPoint;
59 
60  for( tSurface = fContents.begin(); tSurface != fContents.end(); tSurface++ )
61  {
62  tPoint = (*tSurface)->Point( aPoint );
63  tDistance = (tPoint - aPoint).Magnitude();
64  if( tDistance < tNearestDistance )
65  {
66  tNearestDistance = tDistance;
67  tNearestPoint = tPoint;
68  }
69  }
70 
71  return tNearestPoint;
72  }
73  KThreeVector KSGeoSurface::Normal( const KThreeVector& aPoint ) const
74  {
75  double tDistance;
76  KThreeVector tPoint;
77  vector< KGSurface* >::const_iterator tSurface;
78 
79  double tNearestDistance = std::numeric_limits< double >::max();
80  const KGSurface* tNearestSurface = NULL;
81 
82  for( tSurface = fContents.begin(); tSurface != fContents.end(); tSurface++ )
83  {
84  tPoint = (*tSurface)->Point( aPoint );
85  tDistance = (tPoint - aPoint).Magnitude();
86  if( tDistance < tNearestDistance )
87  {
88  tNearestDistance = tDistance;
89  tNearestSurface = (*tSurface);
90  }
91  }
92 
93  if (tNearestSurface != NULL)
94  return tNearestSurface->Normal( aPoint );
95 
96  geomsg( eWarning ) << "geo surface <" << GetName() << "> could not find a nearest space to position " << aPoint << eom;
97  return KThreeVector::sInvalid;
98  }
99 
100  void KSGeoSurface::AddContent( KGSurface* aSurface )
101  {
102  vector< KGSurface* >::iterator tSurface;
103  for( tSurface = fContents.begin(); tSurface != fContents.end(); tSurface++ )
104  {
105  if( (*tSurface) == aSurface )
106  {
107  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"surface <"<<aSurface->GetName()<<"> was already added to geo surface <"<< this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
108  return;
109  }
110  }
111  fContents.push_back( aSurface );
112  return;
113  }
114  void KSGeoSurface::RemoveContent( KGSurface* aSurface )
115  {
116  vector< KGSurface* >::iterator tSurface;
117  for( tSurface = fContents.begin(); tSurface != fContents.end(); tSurface++ )
118  {
119  if( (*tSurface) == aSurface )
120  {
121  fContents.erase( tSurface );
122  return;
123  }
124  }
125  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"can not remove surface <"<<aSurface->GetName()<<">, as it was not found in geo surface <" << this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
126  return;
127  }
128 
129  vector< KGSurface* > KSGeoSurface::GetContent()
130  {
131  return fContents;
132  }
133 
134  void KSGeoSurface::AddCommand( KSCommand* anCommand )
135  {
136  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommand;
137  for( tCommand = fCommands.begin(); tCommand != fCommands.end(); tCommand++ )
138  {
139  if( (*tCommand) == anCommand )
140  {
141  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"command <"<<anCommand->GetName()<<"> was already added to geo surface <"<< this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
142  return;
143  }
144  }
145  fCommands.push_back( anCommand );
146  return;
147  }
148  void KSGeoSurface::RemoveCommand( KSCommand* anCommand )
149  {
150  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommand;
151  for( tCommand = fCommands.begin(); tCommand != fCommands.end(); tCommand++ )
152  {
153  if( (*tCommand) == anCommand )
154  {
155  fCommands.erase( tCommand );
156  return;
157  }
158  }
159  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"can not remove command <"<<anCommand->GetName()<<">, as it was not found in geo surface <" << this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
160  return;
161  }
162 
163  void KSGeoSurface::InitializeComponent()
164  {
165  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
166  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
167  {
168  (*tCommandIt)->GetParent()->Initialize();
169  (*tCommandIt)->GetChild()->Initialize();
170  }
171 
172  return;
173  }
174  void KSGeoSurface::DeinitializeComponent()
175  {
176  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
177  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
178  {
179  (*tCommandIt)->GetParent()->Deinitialize();
180  (*tCommandIt)->GetChild()->Deinitialize();
181  }
182 
183  return;
184  }
